name: Slots 【1G combo】Japanese slot
description:
The lamp flashes as the game starts
Stop the reel and line the bonuses up!

This is where the real game starts
In this slot, during the bonus game,
a drawing for the bonus stock is going on all the time
the stocked bonuses are all used at once
once the bonus game ends!

Get continuous bonuses in a single game
Shoot for a huge payout!
